title: Who Wore It Better?
overview: E! takes a new look at fashion with the original half-hour series, Who Wore It Better? hosted by Catt Sadler and Orly Shani. The show will take a look at the daring stars who set fashion trends around the world, show style aficionados how to recreate the season's most coveted ensembles, and reveal what happens when two stylish celebrities end up gravitating toward the same look. Plus, two celebs go head-to-head to show off their styling prowess as judged by our hosts.
